nodes.bodyText:
Shall we please avoid hardcoding any color values? , The reason is if we put random nice-looking colors like this, this color will oddly appear only in this page this location so shall we just leave the default color or pick a color from color pallets.
@chanaka3d @erangatl  WDYT ?
Same applies here pls don't change fontWeight value randomly
